Valeria

Due to our exclusive luxury laces, this style is extremely limited. We recommend securing your gown as soon as you know it’s ‘The One’.

Effortlessly elegant and feminine, the Valeria two-piece was inspired by the chic, modern romantic. Combining a crop top handmade in exclusive stretch laces, with a flowing silk chiffon skirt that comes to life with movement. The Valeria is the perfect two-piece for the unconventional bride who wants to dance all night.

DETAILS

  • Handmade in our Australian studio, delivered worldwide
  • Made to a standard dress size and height
  • Models wear standard XS (Australian size 8) sample
  • Stretch French lace, Raschel lace and Italian silk chiffon
  • Fresh ivory tone
  • Off-the-shoulder top
  • Sweetheart lining
  • Rubber elastic around neckline and hem edges
  • Full circle silk chiffon skirt with 40cm train
  • Fully lined top with stretch lining
  • Fully lined skirt with satin lining

“Elegant and minimal, Valeria is for the bride who lets her natural beauty do all the talking. Tuck a white rose behind her ear, add a little blush and she shines like the stars” GLL Founder, Megan.

“Valeria is unfussy, comfortable and effortlessly luxurious all at once. The minimalist silk chiffon circle skirt comes to life with movement. She is for the refined, feminine and contemporary bride” GLL Stylist, Bec. 

* We understand how important the ordering of your wedding gown is and our team are there for you throughout the entire process. Our Stylist team are here to assist you with any styling advice you may need via email (stylist@graceloveslace.com.au), phone, live chat and Skype everyday. After you place your order you will be taken care of by Hilary and Karlie until delivery.

*The Valeria in a size X Small is currently available on pre-order with an Early March 2018 delivery* 

Size, Fit + Extra Details+

The Valeria is made to a standard size and height (155cm shoulder to floor).

Our models wear a standard all-over Australian size 8 (XS). To view the International Size Conversion chart and Measurement chart visit our INFO page.

Models measurements (Picture 1):
Height: 177cm
Bust: 79cm
Waist: 61cm
Hips: 85cm
The model is a size XXS-XS. The sample worn is a standard, ready-made size XS.

Due to the easy-fit nature of our gowns (all with a high degree of stretch elements) the fits are versatile. If you are between sizes then you would choose your size depending on how body-hugging you would like your gown. Generally we would recommend ordering a size up if your are between sizes. We are here to help you throughout the process. You can contact our Stylist team if you have any questions regarding styles and sizing - stylist@graceloveslace.com.au

Our Styling Tips+

- Gabriela veil
- Gaia earring
- Dosa heel in white

Special Notes + Questions+

Can I wear a bra?
You can wear a strapless bra or adhesive cups for extra support if required.

What underwear do I wear? We recommend wearing skin coloured, seamless underwear.

Is the dress see-through at all? The Valeria top is fully lined with a stretch ivory lining and the skirt is fully lined with ivory satin.

What does this dress feel like to touch? The Valeria feels soft and luxurious. It has been handmade with a combination of stretch French laces and soft Italian silk chiffon.

How long does it take for my dress to be made? The Valeria is a ready-to-wear style available for immediate purchase. It has been made to a standard size and height (155cm shoulder to floor).

How is my dress made? All of our dresses are designed and hand made at our studio on the Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia.

Can I alter the design of my dress? We would love to give every bride what they request in terms of alterations, however each and every one of our gowns undergo intensive design processes to ensure that the fit, feel and balance of each dress is absolutely perfect. Therefore, we do not offer customisations, unless stated.

What if I lose/gain weight? Our designs are crafted from luxurious French stretch lace, so often if you drop a size in weight, the original size still fits beautifully. If not, it is also very easy to have the dress altered by a professional seamstress if you would like it to be a little more fitted.

Delivery+

We deliver worldwide and sell exclusively through our website and three showroom locations. International orders are sent via UPS Express, which takes between 3-7 business days to arrive. Domestic orders are sent via Australian Express Post, which takes between 1-3 business days to arrive.
